[DQR.IFRS.0102.9540] Verm√∂genswerte with a value of 4,333,100,000 is not equal to the combined total of Current Assets and Noncurrent assets ( 2,842,200,000 + 1,455,100,000 ) with a value of 4,297,300,000. These values should be equal. If assets held for sale is included in the Statement of Financial Position presentation, then consider using CurrentAssetsOtherThanAssetsOrDisposalGroupsClassifiedAsHeldForSaleOrAsHeldForDistributionToOwners instead of current assets. The properties of this ifrs-full:Assets fact are: Period :2019-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : EUR Decimals of Assets : -2 Decimals of Current Assets : -2 Decimals of Non Current Assets : -2

[DQR.IFRS.0105.9556] The following elements are in the presentation linkbase of 01 - Konzern-Gewinn- und Verlustrechnung [Tabelle] but are not included in any calculation relationship in the filing. ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToOwnersOfParent, ifrs-full:ComprehensiveIncomeAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests, ifrs-full:ProfitLossAttributableToNoncontrollingInterests All elements appearing in the face of the financial statements should be included in a calculation relationship somewhere in the filing.
This rule will produce an error irrespective of a fact value being entered for the item(s) listed above.
Rule Element Id:9556 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 -

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 01 - Konzern-Gewinn- und Verlustrechnung [Tabelle] includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax of 318,500,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 318,400,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -1. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax that should add to 318,500,000 are comprised of the following:
+ FinanceIncomeCost -48,600,000 + ProfitLossFromOperatingActivities 367,000,000
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 01 - Konzern-Gewinn- und Verlustrechnung [Tabelle]. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:ProfitLossBeforeTax Total Value : 318,500,000 Total period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -1 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900YRFFGH5AXU4S86/2020-12-31/ESEF/DE/0/zalando-2020-12-31.zip/zalando-2020-12-31/reports/zalando-2020-12-31.xhtml 4440

[DQR.IFRS.0126.9595] The statement 04 - Konzern-Kapitalflussrechnung [Tabelle] includes an inconsistent calculation. The value of the concept ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities of 527,400,000 should be equal to the sum of its child components defined in the calculation linkbase. The sum of these child components is 527,600,000. The values of the addends is determined by adding the values of the child concepts with a decimal value of -1. All values in the financial statements should use the same decimal value. The values reported in the financial statement in the current reporting period of 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 should be complete if the financial statement is to be mathematically accurate and complete. The components of ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities that should add to 527,400,000 are comprised of the following:
+ AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInInventories -262,900,000 (Incorrect decimals: 0 ) + AdjustmentsForDecreaseIncreaseInTradeAndOtherReceivables -139,600,000 (Incorrect decimals: 0 ) + AdjustmentsForDepreciationAndAmortisationExpense 214,500,000 (Incorrect decimals: 0 ) + AdjustmentsForIncomeTaxExpense 92,400,000 (Incorrect decimals: 0 ) + AdjustmentsForIncreaseDecreaseInTradeAndOtherPayables 329,200,000 (Incorrect decimals: 0 ) + AdjustmentsForProvisions -2,100,000 (Incorrect decimals: 0 ) + IncomeTaxesPaidRefundClassifiedAsOperatingActivities -116,700,000 (Incorrect decimals: 0 ) + OtherAdjustmentsForNoncashItems 4,300,000 (Incorrect decimals: 0 ) + ProfitLoss 226,100,000 (Incorrect decimals: 3 ) + CashPaidForSettlementOfClaimsFromShareBasedPayments -3,500,000 (Incorrect decimals: 0 ) + IncreaseDecreaseInOtherAssetsLiabilities 132,100,000 (Incorrect decimals: 6 ) + NonCashExpensesFromShareBasedPayments 53,800,000 (Incorrect decimals: 0 )
The addends are calculated based on the calculation linkbase defined for 04 - Konzern-Kapitalflussrechnung [Tabelle]. If addends are missing then the calculation tree should be amended. The rule will not add dimension components as the financial statement does not include a table. If dimensions are used on the statement then add a table to ensure that the dimensions are defined correctly.
Total Element : ifrs-full:CashFlowsFromUsedInOperatingActivities Total Value : 527,400,000 Total period : 2020-01-01 to 2020-12-31 Dimensions : Decimals : -1 Rule Element Id:9595 Rule version: 18.0.0RC1 - https://filings.xbrl.org/529900YRFFGH5AXU4S86/2020-12-31/ESEF/DE/0/zalando-2020-12-31.zip/zalando-2020-12-31/reports/zalando-2020-12-31.xhtml 4440
